Package crud

Class OrderCrud

java.lang.Object
crud.Crud
crud.OrderCrud
public class OrderCrud extends Crud
The OrderCrud class provides methods for performing CRUD (Create, Retrieve, Update, Delete) operations in the Order Table

  • Method Details

    • insertOrder

      public void insertOrder(Order order) throws SQLException
      Inserts a Order into the Orders table
      Parameters:
      order - An Order Object containing all details (customerID, productID, date, time, address, price) to be entered into the Order table
      Throws:
      SQLException - Error for insertion of an Order into the Order table

    • getOrder

      public Order getOrder(int orderID) throws SQLException
      Retrieves an Order item from the Orders table based on its order ID
      Parameters:
      orderID - The ID of the order to retrieve
      Returns:
      An Order object
      Throws:
      SQLException - Error should an Order not be found in the table

    • getAllOrders

      public List<Order> getAllOrders(int customerID) throws SQLException
      Retrieves all Orders from the Orders table via an INNER JOIN on the Customer table using the customer ID
      Parameters:
      customerID - The logged in customer
      Returns:
      A List of Order objects
      Throws:
      SQLException - Error should an Order not be found in the table

    • deleteOrder

      public void deleteOrder(int orderID) throws SQLException
      Deletes an Order from the Orders table based on its order ID
      Parameters:
      orderID - The ID of the order to retrieve
      Throws:
      SQLException - Error should an Order not be found in the table

    • updateOrder

      public void updateOrder(Order order) throws SQLException
      Updates an Order from the Orders table based on its order ID
      Parameters:
      order - The Order Object with which is being edited
      Throws:
      SQLException - Error should an Order not be found in the table
